verbose_text: In conclusion, the present study demonstrated that EGCG attenuated cardiac dysfunction, reduced myocardial infarct size and cardiac fibrosis, and decreased myocardial apoptosis and oxidative stress by stimulating the SIRT1 signaling pathway in diabetic rats and in H9c2 cells under hyperglycemic conditions when they were subjected to myocardial I/R injury.
evidence: EGCG attenuated cardiac dysfunction, reduced myocardial infarct size and cardiac fibrosis, and decreased myocardial apoptosis
